message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.SY 

The paper discusses the need for intrusion detection in industrial systems, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed concept for intrusion detection involves the use of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques (cs.AI) to analyze network and process data. The paper also discusses the use of different layers of the automation pyramid in industrial facilities, which falls under the category of network infrastructure (cs.NI). The proposed concept involves the integration of different methods to detect attacks, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper discusses the different stages of an attack on industrial applications, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY).
